title: AllData Install CD
description:
READ ME


I TAKE NO CREDIT FOR THE FILES, ALL WERE UPLOADED THANKS TO

Both files are the same thing, one of them is in iso format, the other is uncompressed

***I put the iso format one as optional if any one decide to burn the install cd to a dual layer dvd***


1) click setup, go thru setup process
2) folder called crack inside, copy files to the alldata directory (override the old ones), then click .exe file
3) alldata will start up asking for subscription codes (IGNORE THAT JUST CLICK OK)

your done with the cd installation SETUP here*********



4)download the import cd&#039;s from thepiratebay.com uploaded by !!!!!!ifxp!!!!!!
5)Extract the files using winrar archiver
5)Mount the images to a virtual drive by using ex.(magic iso..etc.)
6)Enjoy



!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!AGAIN I DONT ANY CREDIT FOR THIS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
